subtopics.title: Basic Wh - Questions
phrases: What is your name?
Where do you live?
When is your birthday?
Who is your best friend?
Why are you learning English?
How are you today?
Whose book is this?
Whose idea was it to organize the party?
Whose phone is ringing?
Whose turn is it to cook dinner?

subtopics.title: Questions with How
phrases: How many brothers and sisters do you have?
How much water do you drink every day?
How often do you go to the gym?
How long does it take you to get to work?
How far is your school from your house?
How old are your parents?
How often do you eat out?
How long have you lived here?
How much time do you spend studying English?
How many languages do you speak?
